EXTENSION SERVICES
STRATEGIES FOR MONITORING AND EVALUATION OF IMPLEMENTED EXTENSION ACTIVITIES
STRATEGIES HOW IT IS DONE
1. Meetings The administrator of the Campus conducts regular meeting with the department chairs and/or extension coordinator to monitor the planned and on-going extension activities.
2. Field Visit Faculty members, staff and students engaged in extension activities conduct field
visitation in the service areas.
3. Accomplishment reports The campus extension coordinator regularly submits the accomplishment reports to the
University Extension Unit.
4. Telephone calls or message/ Facebook Through the use of modern-day Messenger technologies like cellphones and the use of social media, information and updates among clients are collected.
5. CvSU Extension In-house review Annual In-house review is conducted by the University Extension Unit to monitor the
implementation and progress of the extension projects.
